urls.title: Florida Gov. DeSantis declared WWE an "essential service." His explanation doesn’t make much sense.
urls.description: "I think people have been starved for content ... we’re watching, like, reruns from the early 2000s."

text: Ron DeSantis tried to explain his weird move to deem pro wrestling an "essential service." It did not go well. https://t.co/ZZIdEpk0MN
